00026     inline void OutputDebugMsg( const char* in_pszMsg )
00027     {
00028         // To see output of this 
00029         // adb logcat ActivityManager:I YourApplication:D AKDEBUG:D *:S
00030         __android_log_print(ANDROID_LOG_INFO, "AKDEBUG", "%s", in_pszMsg);  
00031     }   
00032 #else   
00033     inline void OutputDebugMsg( const char* ){}

00035     // Atomic Operations
00036     // ------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 
00039     inline AkInt32 AkInterlockedIncrement( AkInt32 * pValue )
00040     {
00041         return __sync_add_and_fetch(pValue,1);
00042     }
00043 
00045     inline AkInt32 AkInterlockedDecrement( AkInt32 * pValue )
00046     {
00047         return __sync_sub_and_fetch(pValue,1);
00048     }
00049 
00050     inline bool AkInterlockedCompareExchange( volatile AkInt32* io_pDest, AkInt32 in_newValue, AkInt32 in_expectedOldVal )
00051     {
00052         return __sync_bool_compare_and_swap(io_pDest, in_expectedOldVal, in_newValue);
00053     }
00054 
00055     inline void AkMemoryBarrier()
00056     {
00057 #ifdef AK_CPU_ARM
00058         __asm("DMB ST");    //Wait for stores to complete.
00059 #elif AK_CPU_X86
00060         __asm("mfence");    
00061 #endif
00062     }
00063 
00064     // Time functions
00065     // ------------------------------------------------------------------
00066 
00068     inline void PerformanceCounter( AkInt64 * out_piLastTime )
00069     {
00070         *out_piLastTime = clock();
00071     }
00072 
00074     inline void PerformanceFrequency( AkInt64 * out_piFreq )
00075     {
00076         // TO DO ANDROID ... is there something better
00077         *out_piFreq = CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00078     }
00079 
00080     template<class destType, class srcType>
00081     inline size_t AkSimpleConvertString( destType* in_pdDest, const srcType* in_pSrc, size_t in_MaxSize, size_t destStrLen(const destType *),  size_t srcStrLen(const srcType *) )
00082     { 
00083         size_t i;
00084         size_t lenToCopy = srcStrLen(in_pSrc);
00085         
00086         lenToCopy = (lenToCopy > in_MaxSize-1) ? in_MaxSize-1 : lenToCopy;
00087         for(i = 0; i < lenToCopy; i++)
00088         {
00089             in_pdDest[i] = (destType) in_pSrc[i];
00090         }
00091         in_pdDest[lenToCopy] = (destType)0;
00092         
00093         return lenToCopy;
00094     }
00095 
00096     #define CONVERT_UTF16_TO_CHAR( _astring_, _charstring_ ) \
00097         _charstring_ = (char*)AkAlloca( (1 + AKPLATFORM::AkUtf16StrLen((const AkUtf16*)_astring_)) * sizeof(char) ); \
00098         AK_UTF16_TO_CHAR( _charstring_, (const AkUtf16*)_astring_, AKPLATFORM::AkUtf16StrLen((const AkUtf16*)_astring_)+1 ) 
00099 
00100     #define AK_UTF16_TO_OSCHAR( in_pdDest, in_pSrc, in_MaxSize )    AKPLATFORM::AkSimpleConvertString(  in_pdDest, in_pSrc, in_MaxSize, strlen, AKPLATFORM::AkUtf16StrLen )
00101     #define AK_UTF16_TO_CHAR(   in_pdDest, in_pSrc, in_MaxSize )    AKPLATFORM::AkSimpleConvertString(  in_pdDest, in_pSrc, in_MaxSize, strlen, AKPLATFORM::AkUtf16StrLen )
00102     #define AK_CHAR_TO_UTF16(   in_pdDest, in_pSrc, in_MaxSize )    AKPLATFORM::AkSimpleConvertString(  in_pdDest, in_pSrc, in_MaxSize, AKPLATFORM::AkUtf16StrLen, strlen)  
00103     #define AK_OSCHAR_TO_UTF16( in_pdDest, in_pSrc, in_MaxSize )    AKPLATFORM::AkSimpleConvertString(  in_pdDest, in_pSrc, in_MaxSize, AKPLATFORM::AkUtf16StrLen, strlen)

00106     #define AkAlloca( _size_ ) __builtin_alloca( _size_ )
